Text:
An all time & 4ever classics group.
Unbelievable, if Kurt Cobain would have played until today, but the candle light is blown out 4ever. Maybe he was so extremely powerful and inspiring, because he had to put all his talents in his pretty limited life time on earth.
Thanks for all of us!
Maybe unseen in 1991. Because this is the performanse from Mtv studios in 1992.
